text:
I'm glad you seemed to enjoy today's work. Hana, you're
amazing for answering the interview so honestly.

people might get a bit more
formal or feel nervous.

Interviews are something where what you
say gets published in magazines, after all.

Haha, that's true──!
Now that I think about it, you're right.

I just felt like
I was talking normally.

──It seems like I don't need to worry about
you enjoying the upcoming live, Hana.

Really?
I think I'll be pretty nervous during the live.
